text:
big question:
somebody here has build a referal program inseide HubSpot? we want someting like this:
when a user go to a client stage, we automate a email with a link to a LP with a form when they can add at least 5 referals (email and names) and if that referals go to a client, notify to the original client, and the sales rep owner, that he “wins” something.
So any of you have build something like that?

i have made a referral page before. BUT what we did was make the form non auto populating and the email you provide is actually the account email and the referrers email goes into a separate contact record field for reference.
but it was just one at a time.
the page would redirect back to the same page.
you could do this with a html form and a tool like zapier to parse out the actions into different steps (all creating contacts in HubSpot)
